_meanings:
{@--6@} To
abide, remain, continue or be in any
state, be doing anything, last; <ab>oft.</ab>
used with present participles to 
denote a continuous or uninterrupted
action; {#vidArayanpragarjaMScAste#} <ls>Pt. 1</ls> kept
on, continued, tearing up and 
bellowing; used in this sense also
with an adj., subst., indeclinable,
past part., an adverb ({#tUzRIM#} &c.),
or with the <ab>instr.</ab> of a noun;  
{#suKenAste#} &c.

{@--10@} To let go,
lay or put aside; {#AstAM tAvat#} let
it aside, let it go, to say 
nothing of, not to mention; <ls>K. 18.</ls>

To cause to sit, seat, fix;
{#Asayatsalile pfTvIM#} <ls>Sk.</ls>
